titleStmt.title: The secretary of ladies. Or, A new collection of letters and answers, composed by moderne ladies and gentlewomen, collected by Mounsieur Du Bosque. Translated out of French by I.H.
Nouveau recueil de lettres des dames de ce temps avec leurs responses. English
titleStmt.author: Du Boscq, Monsieur.
Hainhofer, Jerome.
Glover, George, b. ca. 1618, engraver.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Cotes, for William Hope, and are to be sold at the signe of the Vnicorne in Cornehill neere the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Nouveau recueil de lettres des dames de ce temps avec leurs responses.
Translator's dedication signed: Ierome Hainhofer, patritius Augustanus.
With an additional title page, engraved, signed: G. Glo: [i.e. George Glover] fecit.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Vnicorne in Cornehill neere the Royall Exchange
